document_data.name: Myrrth
document_data.race: [[Human]] turned phant and skeletal colossus<ref group="note" name="BotR2">The terms "phant" and "skeletal colossus" were used by [[Thomas M. Costa]] in the unofficial ''[http://www.ericlboyd.com/dnd/monsters.html Bestiary of the Realms: Volume 2]'' for the incorporeal and skeletal types of undead that Myrrth turned into, respectively.
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrrth''' was a famous [[Waterdeep|Waterdhavian]] jester and member of the noble family [[Anteos]] in the 13{{th}} century DR. In death, he sought the help of the [[heroes of Selûne's Smile]] to investigate the defilement of his grave.
document_data.Abilities: As a skeletal colossus, Myrrth's body had a resistance to magic, a withering gaze, as well as the ability to breathe fire and ice.{{Cite comic/Showtime! or Revenge of the Living Monologue}}
